summary: Comprehensive testing completed for home nurse visit app new features: Visit Type Selection and Monthly Reports. All major functionality working correctly.

minor_bugs.issue: Only weight field persisted in last_vitals, other vital signs showing null
minor_bugs.impact: Minor - vitals data is saved in visits but not fully reflected in patient's last_vitals
Very minor - still proper error response

ui_bugs.issue: Some dropdown options not clickable with force=True needed

passed_tests: Visit Type Selection page loads with 3 options
Organization dropdown appears only for nurse visits
Organization dropdown hidden for vitals_only and daily_note
Proceed button enables/disables correctly based on selections
Monthly Reports page loads with all filters
Monthly Reports API generates reports successfully
PDF download button appears after report generation
Navigation flow: login → visit-type → dashboard → patient selection
Visit type and organization stored in sessionStorage
Different forms displayed based on visit type (nurse_visit shows full assessment, vitals_only shows vitals + health status, daily_note shows vitals + daily note textarea)
Backend API endpoints for different visit types working
Monthly reports endpoint with filtering by patient and organization
Visit creation for all three visit types successful
